title: I2C Start and Stop Conditions
summary: Timing diagram illustrating I2C bus start and stop conditions using SDA transitions while SCL is high.

signals.name: SCL
signals.transitions: Clock line high during SDA start/stop transitions; toggles low/high during transfer.

signals.name: SDA
signals.transitions: Start: SDA high-to-low while SCL high. Stop: SDA low-to-high while SCL high.
